about_the_game:
[A Healing Maid Sweet Love Simulation]

Every single part of your experience here is built around "healing" and "love".
Enjoy your slow life with Sophia as she provides you with various relaxation services rendered in beautiful full Live2D.

Sit back and get a daily dose of soothing maid life.

[High-Quality Live2D Animation]
We worked hard to bring you the best character model we could.
Everything has been rendered to the highest standard.- image quality, smoothness of movements, sexiness, and cuteness.
Play it on a large monitor for maximum Sophia.

Warm up this winter

The beautiful, shimmering silver world just outside your window.
The warm crackling of the fireplace, a cozy room with wood accents.
The doting, adorable Sophia.

She can soothe your soul simply by moving.

Winter is when Sophia shines.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes showy lingerie, touching, and other spicy surprises. The scenes featuring lingerie can be quite lengthy.

short_description: Let Sophia whisk your troubles away... Take it easy and enjoy some soothing relaxation time with your maid Sophia, who's fully animated via Live2D!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
